item.title: And now youâ€™re live!
item.description: The Queen’s Park Wireless Club (QPWC - to not tire my fingers) went LIVE this weekend, lanuching the community wireless broadband network at Queen’s Park Day. And what a day! A great response from people at the event. We’re now working to follow-up with all those that we spoke to, to provide answers to FAQ’s on the website and to increase the coverage of the network to provide access to more people.
